thread.title: Dakota Johnson takes the plunge in slinky dress as she poses alongside hunky Jamie Dornan at Fifty Shades Darker premiere
thread.title_full: Dakota Johnson takes the plunge in slinky dress as she poses alongside hunky Jamie Dornan at Fifty Shades Darker premiere

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Dakota Johnson takes the plunge in slinky dress as she poses alongside hunky Jamie Dornan at Fifty Shades Darker premiere
text:
Showbiz Dakota Johnson takes the plunge in slinky dress as she poses alongside hunky Jamie Dornan at Fifty Shades Darker premiere The pretty duo were all smiles as they posed for pictures on the red carpet ahead of the first screening of the film Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now The Fifty Shades cast speak to fans at LA premiere Share this video   Thank you for subscribing!   
Dakota Johnson took centre stage at the Los Angeles premiere for Fifty Shades Darker on Thursday night. 
The 27-year-old beauty has reprised the role of Anastasia Steele in the romantic drama movie and posed alongside her hunky co-star Jamie Dornan, who plays Christian Grey, in Hollywood. 
Opting for an understated yet striking look, the plunging floor-skimming dress showed off just the right amount of cleavage and the fabric clung perfectly to her frame. 
Dakota finished off the emsemble with bold, dark purple lips and a fuss-free hairstyle. Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson (Photo: Rex Features) Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson (Photo: Rex Features) Dakota Johnson (Photo: Rex Features) 
Her handsome co-star Jamie has chopped off his longer locks and was instead rocking a bushy beard for the occasion. 
As well as the star-studded cast, a host of other famous faces were in attendance. 
Singer Halsey also made sure she was hogging the limelight in a very revealing dress. 
The star's cleavage was on full dispaly in the barely-there look, which was made up of two material straps reaching all the way down to her rib cage. Dakota Johnson (Photo: Rex Features) Dakota Johnson (Photo: Rex Features) 
Miley Cyrus' sister also appeared to follow suit with in a daring sheer black dress. 
Earlier in the week, Dakota revealed the film will feature a surprise tribute to her 59-year-old mum Melanie Griffith. 
Dakota explained: "There is a moment, a little surprise moment especially for my mom in this movie." 
Melanie has vowed never to watch her daughter in any of the steamy films, and so Dakota knows her actress mother is unlikely to see the tribute for herself. 
But she told the 'Today' show: "Maybe she'll see this one specific little clip." 
And when she was asked if movie-watchers will notice the subtle tribute, Dakota said: "I hope so. I think so." Like us on Facebook
